titleStmt.title: An answer to Doctor Chamberlaines scandalous and faslse [sic] papers.
titleStmt.author: Philalethes.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy E.605.5: "June. 28"; on copy E.597[3]: 'March 29"; the 49 in imprint date is crossed out and replaced with a "50".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
